Sentencas: An increased interest in using hydrocarbons in solid oxide fuel cells for the production of power has led to research into operation on synthesis (syn) gas, a mixture of hydrogen and carbon monoxide.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hydrocarbons are typically reformed, either internally or in an external reformer prior to the fuel cell, producing syngas with various H-2:CO ratios depending on the hydrocarbon used.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This paper examines the effect of varying the H-2:CO ratio with respect to C-1 to C-4 steam reforming reactions and additionally a mixture containing a higher ratio of carbon monoxide.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that there was no significant relationship between cell performance and H-2 :CO ratio when a high feed rate was employed.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For low flow rates, however, the high carbon monoxide concentration resulted in a significant decrease in cell performance.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was determined that this was caused by reversible carbon deposition as opposed to a decrease in carbon monoxide reactivity.
Titulo: The effect of synthesis gas composition on the performance of Ni-based solid oxide fuel cells
